alert.note: Alert for Hughes (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 13 at 6:56AM CST until December 13 at 7:15AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN HUGHES COUNTY... At 656 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Bearden to near Wetumka to near Holdenville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Holdenville, Wetumka, Horntown and Yeager. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
